Banner.Title: HELMET Initial Farm Offering coming soon to PancakeSwap
Banner.Text: HELMET Trading will start after IFO

Content.LastOne: 最后一次成为流动性商的机会

Table.text1: If 【CAKE-BNB】 swap price is 【lower】/【higher】than 【200】 BNB by the expiration date, you will earn DPR 【3%】 earning without risk.

IIO.InitialOffering: Your OPTION to redefine Initial Offering
IIO.Pool: {name} Initial Offering Pool for HELMET-BNB LPers
IIO.Tip: Do not trasfer tokens to this address
IIO.ActionOne: Pay for {name} ticket then stake your LPT to get your share ({token})
IIO.Tip2: All HELMETs of the ticket will be burnt after this IIO
IIO.SwapMyToken: You have got {num1} {name1}, which could be swapped to {num2} {name2}
IIO.Details_text1: Get the tradable iTokens which could be activated/swapped to IIO Tokens on Insurance tab or IIO tab after the sale.
IIO.Details_text2: This swap required corresponding basic token like BUSD/BNB/HELMET
IIO.Details_text4: 2.Stake them into HELMET-BNB Pool to check your expected share
IIO.Details_title3: What is the Token Burning Mechanism?
IIO.Details_text6: Tickets ($HELMET) from IIO participants raised will be burned forever.
IIO.Details_title4: Will I lose my HELMET-BNB LP for getting new IIO Token?
IIO.Details_text7: There will be no effect on your LPT in the pool, since Helmet team will only scan your LPT Share to calculate your iToken share.
IIO.Details_text8: PLUS, in the period of IIO, you’ll enjoy the Dual-rewards of HELMET-BNB LP Pool.
IIO.Details_text9: iToken distribution mechanism： Basically, the more LPT you have in HELMET-BNB Pool, the more iToken you will get.
IIO.Details_text10: Users can subscribe as much or as little as they want to the IIO, and their final allocation of iToken will be based on the amount of LPT they hold as a percentage of all LPT put in by other users at the time the IIO ends.
IIO.Details_text11: If you have a very small amount of LP tokens compared to the total amount committed by others, your contribution may be such a small part of the total.​
IIO.Details_text12: Before Sale: 1.Buy HELMET and BNB tokens; 2.Get HELMET-BNB LP tokens by adding HELMET and BNB liquidity;
IIO.Details_text13: During Sale: 1.While the sale is live, go to PAY for the IIO ticket; 2.Commit or add your HELMET-BNB LP tokens to start mining your iToken (IIO share);
IIO.Details_text14: After Sale: When the sale is complete, you could 1.Trade the iToken; 2.Swap the IIO tokens by activating your iToken ( you need to prepare enough required basic token like BNB, HELMET or BUSD in your wallet to complete this swap)

NFT.Text1: Do you have {card_Name} NFT Card? Join in #Helmet Gacha Game and scroop {num} Helmet jackpot; Click here:
NFT.Text2: Please recheck the address before you send cards. This transaction is non-retreatable and Helmet.insure will not be held responsible for any losses. You will send {card_Name} NFT
NFT.NFT_TIP1: If you didn't claim your cards, PLZ  refresh and wait until 'Check my 10 cards' →'re-claim your cards' button shows.
NFT.NFT_TIP2: Please 'claim your cards' in 5min otherwise you will lose them.

Tip.Dpr: Daily percentage of yield, DPR= daily yield / staking volume
Tip.Active1: Please double check the price above，
Tip.Active2: Helmet team will not cover your loss on this.
Tip.SendCoin: Please do not transfer your Helmet into this smart contract address, just connect your wallet and change it to BSC net.
Tip.RiskWarningContent: If you are a new Helmet Insure user, please do not trade any policies before getting a clear understanding about the trading risks and option trading logic. We recommend you read the 'Paper & Guide' section before proceeding.
Tip.BurnTip1: Burning Expired Policy for New Gems.
Tip.BurnTip2: You could get new gems based on your pool share in the burning period.
Tip.FlashTip1: Flash Mining is a short-term policy mining campaign.
Tip.FlashTip2: You could farm different policy with the notice of expiration date.
Tip.MiningTip2: You can farm dedicated Helmet tokens, or earn COMBO rewards by staking different Liquidity Provider Tokens (LPTs).
Tip.IIOTip2: New assets distribution model with European option logic.
Tip.EarnTip1: Daily income withdrawal and manual reinvestment.
Tip.EarnTip2: The return on compound interest will get higher and higher over time.

Migration.StakeTitle: Stake HELMET-BNB LPT to get GUARD credits
Migration.Jump: You will swich to guard.insure in {number}s (to claim GUARD)
Migration.Dialog: Necessary to Confirm then get Guard credits
Migration.Tips1: STAKING in HELMET-BNB LPT Mining Pool to get Guard credits reward;
Migration.Tips2: Daily GUARD credits distribution hard cap: 10,000 . Your credits are based on your LPT share in the pool;
Migration.Tips3: You should claim your Guard credits before using it.
Migration.Tips4: To get GUARD, you need to burn corresponding amount of HELMET;
Migration.Tips5: Daily burning hard cap: 10,000 HELMET. (Update at 22:00 SGT daily)
Migration.Tips7: New polygon dev plan in!!!  Better&healthier bridge approach rush on its way and your GUARD Credits are still valid!!!

IBO.IBO_text25: IBO: Mini IBO with 50% HELMET raising fund burnt.
IBO.IBO_text26: You need to prepare HELMET to get the IBO share.
IBO.IBO_text27: Disclaimer — All projects are subject to both high market risk and volatility. Projects from IBO part might witness high risk and Please, do your own research and full due diligence before even considering to invest your funds in any project and please, make your investments very cautiously.
